Title: Investigate The ESG Score Methodology. (arXiv:2312.00202v2 [q-fin.PM] UPDATED)
Abstract: Whether the Refinitiv provide a reliable and trusted methodology in the process of aggregating 10 category scores to overall score?
translated_abstract: 研究Refinitiv在将10个类别的分数汇总为总体分数的过程中是否提供了可靠和值得信赖的方法论。
tldr: 这项研究探索了Refinitiv在将10个类别的分数汇总为总体分数的过程中所采用的ESG评分方法论的可靠性和可信度。
en_tdlr: This study investigates the reliability and trustworthiness of Refinitiv's ESG score methodology in aggregating scores from 10 categories into an overall score.
